LanguageData.Gossip.degreeDatas.0.label: gossip
LanguageData.Trustworthy.degreeDatas.0.label: trustworthy
LanguageData.Trustworthy.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is someone you can trust with your innermost thoughts. If you ask {PAWN_objective} to keep something to {PAWN_objective}self, {PAWN_pronoun} will.
LanguageData.Manipulative.degreeDatas.0.label: manipulative
LanguageData.Manipulative.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is socially manipulative. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't always talk ill of people, but if {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't like someone, {PAWN_pronoun} will try to turn the rest of the colony against them.
LanguageData.Peacemaker.degreeDatas.0.label: peacemaker
LanguageData.Peacemaker.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} just can't stand other people fighting. {PAWN_pronoun} will always try to persuade others to put aside their differences..
LanguageData.Gushing.degreeDatas.0.label: gushing
LanguageData.Gushing.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't have a particular problem keeping other people's secrets, but can't help over sharing {PAWN_possessive} own.
LanguageData.CompulsiveLiar.degreeDatas.0.label: compulsive liar
LanguageData.CompulsiveLiar.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a difficult relationship with the truth. This causes {PAWN_objective} to have difficult relationships with other colonists, as well.
